assessments.status_rationale: ISM Manufacturing PMI for October 2025 has not been released yet (due by 2025-11-01), and today’s news provides no print.
October 2025 nonfarm payrolls are due by 2025-11-08; no result reported in the provided news.
The October 2025 U-3 unemployment rate is scheduled for release by 2025-11-08; no data point in today’s coverage.
September 2025 Advance Retail Sales release is due by 2025-10-16; no figures yet.
S&P Global U.S. Composite PMI (final) for October 2025 is due by 2025-11-05; no publication noted.
Euro area unemployment for September 2025 is due by 2025-10-31; no result reported.
The IWM vs. SPY performance window just began (2025-10-12 to 2025-11-30); too early to determine underperformance by ≥2.5 pp.
No clear evidence that the ICE BofA U.S. Corporate OAS has reached ≥1.20% by now; the deadline is 2025-11-30.
No confirmation that LME Copper 3M has hit $9,800/t yet; the window remains open until 2025-11-30.
EIA storage ≥3,850 Bcf could occur during autumn builds, but no specific report cited; deadline is 2025-11-15.
Apple’s fiscal Q4 2025 results are not yet released; deadline is 2025-11-10.
